Concept Engine texture tool
Last updated by Jari Korkala 20/6/2016

************************************************************************
Build 5

- Normalization of base texture when normal map compression drops
  blue channel

************************************************************************
Build 4

- Can load rgb PNG and compress it into DXT1

- Normal maps are compressed in DXT5 so that red channel (x) is
  stored in alpha channel and red,blue are set to one.
